record.description: King Glamour Pants. Co-eds Ellen O'Connor, Amy Barnes, Ann Duvendeck, and Inger Olson (left to right), look admiringly at Larry Keilman after his crowing as "King Glamour Pants" at a Midway carnival on the University of Chicago campus that fifteen women's social clubs sponsored. Four hundred dollars was raised for the World Student Service Fund which helps needy students complete their education.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
